Articles.Content:
this is princess venus and im in need of an interplanetery spacecraft with the deep space pack and the new orbital revelotion and docking mod sorry can't spell

spacecraft requierments:

must be capable to leave kerbin orbit and duna or eve arival

must have a docking node radial and a target node on the nose

must be able to dock with skynode 1

must be able for a lander to dock on

must have sas, asas and rcs+thusters

must be able to be launched by a core rocket mod or any like it

plese test your ship before puting it on the forms

Edited September 18, 2012 by princess venus
change of plan
A long list there but i will see what i can come up with!
This really isn't readable, try and add some punctuation, capital letters and fix some of that spelling. I don't understand what you want at all.

Interpreted:

This is princess venus and I'm in need of an interplanetary spacecraft with the deep space pack.

The spacecraft needs to:

> take off from launch pad

> have a chemical rocket for desert or any planet arrival

> have a separate lander to land on a planet or moon (can use any mods must hold three kerbals)

> have ion engines for interplanetary travel

> have RCS on spacecraft and lander

> carry a cart for exploring (can be any cart, but must be small and light)

> carry an re-entry pod for Kerbin re-entry (can use any mod must hold three Kerbals, I would really like it to be a mini shuttle)

I'll choose three then let the public vote, so good luck.

How to test the spacecraft:

> Go to Mun or Minmus

> Separate the rover with a Kerbal on board

> Separate the lander with 2 Kerbals on board

> Test the rover and lander ladder

> Return to the spacecraft and then to Kerbin

> Separate the re-entry craft and land in the water or glide to the ksp runway
That's a bit of a tall order...
